translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF train #1302 will not operate

BNSF train #1302 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 12:20 am, will not operate due to an earlier pedestrian being struck by a train. Customers are encouraged to seek alternate transportation.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 55th/56th/57th Street East Elevator Back in Service
The 55th/56th/57th Street east elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
University Park Station East Entrance and East Parking Lot Are Open - Canopies Refurbished (Update)

The University Park canopy refurbishing project is complete. Passengers have full access to the east and west station and parking lot platform entrances. Metra appreciates your patience throughout the project.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th Street/Chatham Elevator is Back in Service
The 79th Street/Chatham elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
103rd St./Rosemoor Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 103rd St./Rosemoor station may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF train #1291 will not operate past Naperville

Update: BNSF train #1291, scheduled to arrive Aurora at 11:51 PM, will not operate past Naperville due to a pedestrian being struck by a train. Track 3 has been released for train movement. Train #1293 will be the next train accommodate customers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF train #1289 will not operate past Naperville

Update: BNSF train #1289 scheduled to arrive Aurora at 10:51 pm, will not operate past Naperville due to a pedestrian being struck by the train. Track 3 has been released for train movement. Train #1293 will be the next train to accommodate passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF train #1293 will now operate to Aurora

Track 3 has been released for train movement. BNSF train #1293 scheduled to arrive Aurora at 12:51 am, will now operate and make its scheduled stops to Aurora due to an earlier pedestrian being struck by a train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The Van Buren Platform Elevator
The Van Buren Platform elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service.
The 87th Street/Woodruff elevator is out of service. Customers can use 55th/56th/57th Street or 103rd Street/Roosmoor as alternate boarding stations.
